displayAfterTransitionEnd.description: Determines whether indicator should be displayed after transition ends, should be set if used inside a container that has transform: scale(n) styles
displayAfterTransitionEnd.description_zh: 确定过渡结束后是否应显示指示器，如果在具有 transform： scale（n） 样式的容器内使用，则应设置该指示器

parent *.description: Parent element with relative position based on which indicator position should be calculated
parent *.description_zh: 具有相对位置的父元素，该位置基于应计算指标位置

target *.description: Target element over which indicator should be displayed
target *.description_zh: 应在其上显示指示器的目标元素

transitionDuration.description: Transition duration in ms, 150 by default
transitionDuration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位），默认为 150
